title: Why so much TSM hype?
body: Can someone please explain this to me?

replies.body:
Watch every TSM match for Season 5.

Then you have your answer.
Except TSM vs Team 8 (Week 1) and TSM vs TIP (Week 6). Ignore those to maintain absolute Baylife Hype.

They just won IEM Katowice, a big tournament sponsored by Intel. They won consistently against Asian teams, which TSM has historically had trouble against. This gives TSM fans hope for their chances at World's.
they have been playing very well this season. it pains me to say but they are really good at the moment. c9 on the other hand his playing like scrubs, only sneaky seems to actually show up at games
